config.morph.cat.morph.name: Morph Ability
config.morph.prop.morphTime.name: Morph Time
config.morph.prop.morphTime.desc: Time (in ticks) for a morph to complete.
config.morph.prop.disabledMobs.name: Disabled Mobs
config.morph.prop.disabledMobs.desc: Resource Location name for Mob types you cannot acquire biomass or morphs from.
config.morph.prop.aggressiveSizeRecalcul: Morph normally only recalculates size when it has to. This makes Morph recalculate the player size every tick whilst morphed.
config.morph.prop.supportedAttributes.de: Which attributes are supported by more, and how are values better. Format: <Resource Name of Attribute>;<more/less>. EG: "minecraft:generic.max_health;more".
config.morph.prop.morphClassic.name: Morph Classic
config.morph.prop.morphClassic.desc: Enable this for Morph Classic. No Biomass or Morph restrictions.
config.morph.prop.biomassSkinWhilstInvis: The Biomass Skin is meant to show during invisibility. Turning this off disables that.
config.morph.prop.selectorDistanceFromTo: The number of (scaled) pixels that the quick selector's selected option appears from the top of the screen.
config.morph.prop.selectorScale.name: Selector - Scale
config.morph.prop.selectorScale.desc: The scale of the selector (fractionally). Smaller numbers to scale down, larger numbers to scale up.
config.morph.prop.selectorAllowMouseCont: Allow control of the selector using the mouse. Also affects the radial menus.
config.morph.prop.radialScale.name: Radial Menu - Scale
config.morph.prop.radialScale.desc: The scale of the radial menu, in ratio to the size of the game.
config.morph.prop.acquisitionPlayAnimati: Plays the "acquisition" animation. 0 = Disable, 1 = Morph only, 2 = Biomass only, 3 = Biomass and Morph
config.morph.prop.acquisitionTendrilMaxC: The (approximate) maximum part count for a tendril. Also partially dictates the length (in ticks) of the animation. Higher = More parts, slower animation, Lower = Less parts, faster animation.
config.morph.prop.acquisitionTendrilPart: In first person, tendrils closer to you are partially opaque to reduce obscuring of your vision. Increase this number to keep tendrils partially transparent for longer distances.
Reextract Mob Support Files from zip
command.morph.resources.error.extraction: An error occurred when extracting files. Check Java Console for more info.
command.morph.morph.error.notLivingEntit: Entity supplied is not a LivingEntity type!
morph.gui.workspace.title: Biomass Menu
morph.gui.scene.biomassUpgrades.title: Upgrades
morph.gui.scene.biomassAbilities.title: Abilities
morph.gui.scene.morphs.title: Morphs
morph.gui.text.weight.tooltip: %1$s kg is %2$s lb for you imperial folk.
morph.advancement.unlock_biomass.title: A Mutation Complication
morph.advancement.unlock_biomass.descrip:
Rapid cellular death combined with rapid cellular regeneration increases the risk for random mutations.

Unlocks the ability to absorb Biomass.
